A4.text: The next edition of the Games, the twenty-third or XXIII, is scheduled to be held in Glasgow from 23 July to 2 August 2026.

A5.text: The upcoming Games will be markedly smaller in scale, featuring only ten sports... scheduled to be held in Glasgow from 23 July to 2 August 2026.
